website_summaries.verdict: If you want something a little stronger than a bag, these boxes will do the trick.
pros: They come as a set, so if you have a lot of stuff to put away, this is a great starting point
Has a low profile so it's easy to slide under your bed
cons: When they're fully loaded, there are some issues with the lids fitting snugly

customer_reviews.title: Picture is different from the item being sold.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the container. It does say the lid is white, however the picture shows a clear lid. The picture should be the exact item being sold. It might not matter to you, but true pictures of what you are selling should be important to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased seven 8-packs of these totes over the course of four orders and not a single one arrived broken or cracked--counter to what other reviewers have reported. They hold a lot, reveal the contents clearly, stack well, and the price from Amazon Warehouse Deals is the best I could find for the large capacity. I will order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!! All the lids s are cracked very weak and no latch at all!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina C.

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot, but the top is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I use these to store new and used parts for my car restoration. I like that they have handles, and are stackable, and have a hinge top (I always lose the separate tops, or they don't fit right.) The two complaints I have is that the lid(s) are kind of flimsy. I'm really worried they will not hold the weight of the tub on top. Also, the hinge mechanism is really really bad - 4 out of the 6 I received, the top flap hinge was already "out". It's just a small pin on either end of the hinge.
customer_reviews.author: D. Plass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of these storage boxes and I received exactly what is shown in the pictures, clear base and a white lid. I use these for storing the items I am selling on eBay and Poshmark and they fit on the shelves wonderfully. It makes it so much easier when things are organized. I will be back to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Ann

customer_reviews.title: Only 5 bins received with 6 lids
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect size for what I want to do with them howevever, I only received 5 bins and 6 lids
customer_reviews.author: Brien Labry

customer_reviews.title: Good condition
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these, totaling 8 containers. I believe my seller was Amazon or someone who delivered with Amazon. I read the previous reviews about all the cracked containers and I had been paranoid about receiving mine the same way. I just received mine and luckily they were all ok. The only thing that bothered me was that four of my lids were kind of bent and obviously affected by this summer heat. That’s keeping the containers from staying shut and it kind of stays lifted. I can live with that. Nothing came broken. They’re all being used for Christmas decorations. I’m satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Came broken,I wish I took all of the at once out of box it would save my time. I was taking one by one,filling with things and putting to attic,as I got to the last one found out it was totally broken.Now I have to go through the trouble and return the entire set.I wish I could replace the only broken one,but doesn’t work like that.Oh well.. People,take them all out of box,because you don’t know what on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Halyna

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized storage totes
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized boxes. I'll definitely be ordering more. I got this for when it's time to move and it'll definitely make it easier instead of buying loads of boxes that are only good for a few uses. The only problem I had with my shipping is ONE box had a corner chipped! That is not a bad deal to me and I was SUPER worried that they would arrive broken after going through the reviews and looking at the pics posted. I chose standard shipping though because I know with Prime they try to rush it out as soon as possible and your products often arrive damaged. But mine were just fine. Going to order 2 more bundles!
customer_reviews.author: Ana Radney

customer_reviews.title: Usable, but could do better on the lid.
customer_reviews.text: I can fit about 4 ~ 5 under my queen size bed. So what did I do with the 6th one? Welp, I dunno yet. Probably put it up in my closet or something. Great product, but I wish the lid felt more... tight. I feel like bugs could still get into these bins, and I don't like that at all. The point of buying plastic bins is to prevent the creepy crawlers from getting into them and damaging whatever is inside. Not asking for a water proof seal, just asking to protect my old books, papers, clothes, and other memorabilia from bugs. I'll make use of what I paid for and hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: They will work for under the bed
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious about ordering this boxes, because people complain about them arriving broken. Thankfully mine had only very minor damage in 2 boxes. I'm happy with the purchase, but I can see that this boxes are not sturdy enough for most people. We really needed under bed storage for our small apartment, but the boxes needed to be a very specific size. This boxes are just perfect, and we were able to stack them on top of each other! To be fair, we did raise our bed, but the other smaller boxes I had, were too tall to stack up. Overall, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dalila Hornick

customer_reviews.title: Fragile lids
customer_reviews.text: A couple of lids arrived cracked but I didn't bother to return. Overall, the item is passable if you're just going to use it to store stuff that otherwise would cause clutter. It is definitely not worthy of using for anything that should be in a watertight, airtight, weather-resistant container or if your use case is to move the box around frequently. Doesn't bother me much for my use case so while I am not impressed, I don't let the quality bother me
customer_reviews.author: neonblaze

customer_reviews.title: Standard sterilite product
customer_reviews.text: These are the same product family as the ones you can buy at stores. I say product family because it seems that Sterilite has different suppliers with close, but not exact standards. The 10 pack is nice because all 10 will stack together. I have other same-description sterilite 28 Quart storage boxes and there seems to be at least 3 versions of the same boxes with different lid sizes and different bottoms on the boxes, so they don't stack with each other.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Michels

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with two lids cracked -- definitely would not purchase these in winter months where it is cold. Seller did credit me for the two broken, so I kept the rest. However, they seem flimsy, too. Lids do not fit tightly. I cannot recommend them. Perhaps they would be fine for sliding in and out from under the bed, but they do not at all seem sturdy enough to carry anything in.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good clear storage bins
customer_reviews.text: The work great and stack well but prefer the larger older 66 quart size which they don't seem to make in this style anymore. I do not care for the newer ones with the cheap locks on them. These work flawlessly and snap well.
customer_reviews.author: kagey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase and seller
customer_reviews.text: Containers were delivered sooner than promised. Arrived w/ none broken and proper count of lids/containers. Very happy with purchase. Gave durability 4 stars because the lid design is not as good (IMO) as previous. I doubt I can stack these as high as I could before, but for my current need they are perfect. I would purchase again but would look elsewhere if I needed to stack high with very heavy items (like books).
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Odom

customer_reviews.title: Good value!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because of the low price. They are not as tough as some that are way more expensive but they are nice tubs for storage. I wouldn't recommend for tubs you want to haul around and load and unload, but for being on a shelf and taking things out periodically they are great. And I love that they are clear to see the contents.
customer_reviews.author: MTcatlady

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Containers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. I purchased a new lower frame for my king size bed. These fit under it perfectly and is storage for winter clothing and shoes. Came quickly and had no issues. There are certainly fancier - more expensive ones out there, but these suited my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ldkmo

customer_reviews.title: Underbed box with lid
customer_reviews.text: Boxes look sturdy and do what they are supposed to do: Fit under the bed and store things. Of course they are not really large and they are shallow - or they would not fit under a bed (- and of course, a storage box is not a TARDIS, so you can not put too much into it. You should measure if the size is right for you.) Okay, they are also a little bit pricy, but the boxes have lids that prevent that things get dusty, and they turn the space under my bed into a great (and organized!) storage space for seasonal cloth and other stuff I don't need all the time. I am glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: ChR

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Needed something to store my Summer clothes for the winter and the box couldn't hold my light thin summer clothes. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: I like the Sterlite container
customer_reviews.text: I like the Sterlite container, but who in their right mind is going to pay over $20 for a single container? These things are $7 at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Fahr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Under Bed Storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to organize my grandson’s room. He will be 10 next week and has moved to a full size bed, which leaves less space in his room. These worked perfectly to store his shoes, baseball caps and toys under his bed. They’re easy for him to get to, so there’s no excuse for his room not to be clean. Right?!?
customer_reviews.author: Angela Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: NOT durable enough to withstand shipping!!!
customer_reviews.text: These tubs were JUST delivered to me and it’s upsetting that I waited for them for 1 week+ and then to finally get them and find that they are all broken and cracked on one side . Disappointed. Will not order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Austin & Mandy

customer_reviews.title: but that was fine with me because I was able to pack even ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to assist in our move, they were larger than I was expecting, but that was fine with me because I was able to pack even more into them. I love that they were clear so I can see what is in them making unpacking much easier. Also now that we have moved they have become part of our storage solution in our new home. They seem very sturdy and stack up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: One broke easily, but they rest of the 16 I used worked perfectly and have lasted well stacked with books inside them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these containers
customer_reviews.text: I love these containers . Great for my Christmas decorations so i can see whats in them. Price is reasonable. Only reason I gave 4’stars was itook almost 4 weeks to get them. I actually had to call Amazon and tell then the tracking said they were lost in Houston. They sent them out Tuesday, I got them yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Half of them are broken, due to lack of packaging. The are not sturdy at all. Waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: manu tice

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for storage for my boots for quite awhile. I didn't want to spend this much, but I'm glad I did. Everything else seemed so flimsy, or hard to open. These came double packed, no damage. They easily hold 2 pairs of knee-high boots, probably more. One thing, I had to buy bed-lifters to fit these under my bed even tho they seem to be the shortest you can buy. Also, I have a queen-size bed and they are so long, you can't fit them on both sides long-wise. At least one side has to be stored the other way. I still got 5 of them to fit easily.
customer_reviews.author: amy singstock

customer_reviews.title: Can hold up to boiling water.... Should hold up for storage
customer_reviews.text: I've used these to house and prepare substrate for arachnids. I start by adding Coco coir and then boiling water directly to the bin. All I can say is that any "cheap plastic bin that doesn't deform from 2 inches of boiling water is a good bin! I've had these about 6 months and besides being brittle (if you try to cut into it) this is a terrific bin that is VERY reasonably priced for the size.
customer_reviews.author: matt bird

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive solution for under-bed storage
customer_reviews.text: We were looking at getting a pedestal with drawers for our king bed which would have cost a several hundred dollars. This was a much less expensive option to store our off season clothing in under the bed. And don't have to worry about them coming off the rails or the construction of the drawers being cheap as was described in most of the reviews I read on the pedestal drawer options.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer MacGregor

customer_reviews.title: HURRAY!
customer_reviews.text: My storage containers arrived a few days ago, and they are fabulous. Hinged lids are white interlocking. Container itself is translucent and I can see right through at what type of fabrics I have stored in each one. They arrived in perfect condition and was just what I was looking for. These containers in such light colors and translucent from Sterilite are very difficult to find now. Seller was prompt in filling and shipping my order. Very thankful! Hurray!
customer_reviews.author: E.J. HansenTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but broken!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these tubs and this time one of them arrived with the corner totally shattered. The box they were shipped in was much larger than the stack of tubs were and they likely tossed around in there enough to crack the corner pretty badly. Considering I would have to ship all 6 back and I need them urgently....I decided not to return them. But now I am stuck with one shattered tub.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Pinckard

customer_reviews.title: However this great deal offers six containers with lids for only $68
customer_reviews.text: What a deal!! If you bought only one it would cost $20 so six would be $120. However this great deal offers six containers with lids for only $68. Everyone has more than one bed in their homes. Three of these containers will fit under a single size bed if inserted vertically. They are lightweight and easily slide in and out. Wonderful extra storage for any any and all supplies and excess papers.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wurst

customer_reviews.title: Good deal overall
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price I got these at and the size of the containers. They're more durable than expected (I would definitely not call them flimsy). They also stack well on top of each other. The only con would be the lids don't snap shut well if you have anything remotely bulging in the box. This makes the boxes a bit hard to lift if you stuff it even a little. I have a fleece blanket in one and that prevents the lid from shutting properly.. I guess you can say the closure on the lid isn't strong enough to push a fleece blanket down.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great boxes - need to be packed more carefully
customer_reviews.text: These boxes are great. They are big enough but not too big. Sadly, the bottom box in my set was totally broken. Probably from shipping. I had been using them one at a time from the box they were shipped in, and this was the bottom box. I wish I could get partial refund.
customer_reviews.author: Walter G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very big containment and low profile to fit under the bed
customer_reviews.text: Very big box hold a lot of stuff, mostly we are using them to store stuff and put under the bed thanks to the low profile design. It's also stackable, good for garage or attic storage. Giving 4 star because one came damaged
customer_reviews.author: Ding Ma

customer_reviews.title: These are extremely flimsy... you can always ...
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely flimsy... you can always stack and maybe two before the lid on the bottom starts to crumble into the center. And once it does that it does not reform to the top of the container
customer_reviews.author: a believer!

customer_reviews.title: Storage Boxes - Excellent Design, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of storage boxes that were the same size and would fit on a closet shelf. The Sterlite 56 quart box was a perfect fit. I was so impressed with the quality that I purchased another 8 box set for the "stuff' in our attic.
customer_reviews.author: Kenosha2013

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to store some crafts that I only occasionally use. They fit perfectly, two stacked together, under my bed. I love how they are clear, so I can see what is in each tote for ease in finding what I need. I am already planning on buying some more.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca1

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away. Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. They sent a replacement but those also arrived damaged. The ones that were in usable condition are flimsy. The lids barely close. Only positives are the size and their transparency.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked the clearness of the boxes
customer_reviews.text: I put labels on boxes when I store summer/winter clothes during the seasons, but I especially liked it that I could see what clothes were in which boxes. The lids attached easily, too.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Red Rider

customer_reviews.title: Good, arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Im only giving it 4 stars because one box showed up chipped on one edge. I can and still will use it, and it’s not bad enough to downvote the product, but it’s not ideal
customer_reviews.author: Merrick

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST WORTHLESS FOR CLOTHES UNLESS CHILD or SMALL PERSON
customer_reviews.text: The OUTSIDE width is 16" NOT 16 5/8". But, MOST IMPORTANTLY, the INSIDE WIDTH of these are JUST 12"! That means unless you are storing small people or kids clothes, you can only get 2 layers of clothes width-wise - unless you fold them 3 times which means more creases/wrinkles. So you can only store a small number of blouse types - and if you have sweater jackets or similar a little longer that are a little bulky, you'd be lucky to get more than 2 in unless you squish them down.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover from HB

customer_reviews.title: Not a good purchase....
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of six of these....on an open box deal. I should have known when I opened the box, and there was already a completely destroyed bin.... The rest of the bins have not been stackable, they have broken, cracking along the edges, the lids also cracked.... I would not recommend these...
customer_reviews.author: EAB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fitting underneath you bed
customer_reviews.text: Needed to store some items . . . . . . and had a baby puppy to keep out from underneath my bed also. Solved two things in one. Can you believe she loves to hide just beside these storage bins underneath the bed now and with her paws scratches the sides and plays with them. Bichon Frise puppy 4lbs 5oz. Doesn't scratch it really. Just plays with it. But still then I know where she is also . . . . . . an I stored the items that needed to be out of her way also. Amazon you all are great for having things we need.
customer_reviews.author: Bley

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect sized for closet shelves.
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I purchased the larger version of the product, but quickly learned that my 5'3'. 130.lb body couldn't lift my seasonal decocarations through the opening of my "sized down" home. not only did this size suit every storage need, I found that when my adult children came to visit, I could make a clean case for no longer being able to store their college memories due to space! Actually, the boxes were full of sweaters and purses, but it's my space! Right?
customer_reviews.author: Jan M. McCall

customer_reviews.title: Good Storage
customer_reviews.text: These are great for long term storage. I'm using them for blankets and stuff like that. You can see what's in them but I label the totes anyway.
customer_reviews.author: William Viands

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much as expected
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much as expected. One of the lids was cracked when delivered. The sides are pretty hazy - not real clear. That's fine for my purposes though.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Franks

customer_reviews.title: Good containers, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Great size for large sets of toys, and easy for my kiddo to open- but the packaging had no padding, so two of six were damaged when I received them. I kept them anyway, because one had pretty minimal damage to a hinge, and I've had a hard time finding anything else similarly priced, but I was disappointed that one of them is badly cracked and really not good to use, especially around my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Family of Four

customer_reviews.title: Accurate description of dimensions
customer_reviews.text: These fit under my bed just a bit too snugly. From the top of my carpet to the bottom of the framing of my bed is exactly the height of the containers with the lids on, I did need to press into the carpet slightly to get under the lip of my frame (beyond the frame the space is considerably taller)
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: prefect size for our basement shelving
customer_reviews.text: After a basement flood, we decided we needed all plastic totes instead of cardboard. These fit perfectly onto our basement shelving and hold all our junk while still being able to see inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Semmler

customer_reviews.title: Did not recieve 6 boxes
customer_reviews.text: I did not recieve 6 boxes as my order and the box itself said on it. I only recieved five boxes and five lids and would appreciate receiving the sixth box as I was supposed to and as I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Found what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed additional tubs and wanted the same type I already had. They are sturdy and stack well without wasted space from rounded ends.
customer_reviews.author: SandiW

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage.  Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The containers are great. The only complaint i have is that 1 of the containers was horribly cracked. I didn't feel it was worth the hassle of returning so i just threw it out. The lids flip to close, so if you're looking for a container with a seal, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a crowded but organized storage unit with plenty of bins-- the blue kind, where I have to write down what's inside each one-- not so with these sterilites -- They are clear, and I can see what's inside each bin. The price was right, they arrived very well packed and they are big. Enough said
customer_reviews.author: BookAce

customer_reviews.title: These are super useful- I was surprised by how small they were
customer_reviews.text: These are super useful- I was surprised by how small they were, but I probably should've read more carefully! I was just thinking they'd be extra long, but they're about the width of a standard storage tub. They're sturdy though and It turned out to be a bonus that they're smaller, because our stuff is more organized and visible this way :) So maybe get out your yardstick if you need a visual for the dimensions, like I should have!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson E.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: These large, sturdy, clear containers serve my storage needs perfectly. This container has been difficult to find in the big box stores as of late, and I was happy to find them online. Thanks for the prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: JanMarie

customer_reviews.title: I got 6 of these and they are perfect for storing things I don't use everyday either under ...
customer_reviews.text: I got 6 of these and they are perfect for storing things I don't use everyday either under the bed or in the closet. I have my fabric stash in two of them in the closet, and then my art supplies and crafting supplies in the rest under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Chitwood

customer_reviews.title: it breaks easily very flimpsy
customer_reviews.text: not high quality it breaks easily. I will only by from amazon. save you time and headaches with other sellers. Still trying to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: justineleen

customer_reviews.title: Most Come Broken
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you check the box when you get them. We use a couple of them a month and when we got to the middle, the remaining ones were broken. The return was only available for 30 days and we found the broken ones on day 45.
customer_reviews.author: Bosty

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: 3/8 arrived broken and not usable. This made me question how durable these are. The only positive thing from this order was how easy it was to send these back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: GrammyLew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the space intended for them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for the specific dimensions written in the description & I'm pleased to say it was accurate & they fit PERFECTLY! I love the way the top is hinged so you don't have to struggle with taking the entire lid off- just open it up. I am very pleased with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: MAJ

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory Storage Bins
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these bins are totally acceptable. I use them to store (and move) clothes and bike parts. They aren't industrial weight, but, for the price, you shouldn't expect them to be, so that was no surprise. The handles are comfortable for carrying. The plastic isn't too brittle (but, again, not industrial strength). My #1 complaint is that the lids are somewhat lower than the top of the plastic. This means that these boxes are about and inch or two smaller than advertised. Oh well. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Hmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Expect at least one to be damaged. Descent bins for light duty storage.
customer_reviews.text: Received 5 of the 6 bins in good condition. The 6th bin was cracked and shattered in several places, barley usable. No time to return. I was disappointed but it was expected. These are medium to light duty bins. They are good for light stuff. Not good for constant handling. They can stack 2-3 high depending on the load. Best stored individually on a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: annie gallo

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. My mother uses these as storage bins for her under bed trundle but she uses it without the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for stacking in a garage
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for my needs and I like that they were see-through I can see what store instead of playing the guessing game
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is holding up well
customer_reviews.text: This was a good deal for a bulk of these tubs. They are holding up well. We use them in the under storage of our travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Would by again.
customer_reviews.text: Durable enough for the price. Perfect for my needs. Held up during a 2200 mile move. Would buy again. B+
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect durability, and cost. No problems receiving/or in transit. We are now more organized!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Cross

customer_reviews.title: Good price and size
customer_reviews.text: 56 quart is great size for all my holiday decor; however, would like if the lids locked in better. The lid clicks into place near the handles and can be flimsy and pop off when handled.
customer_reviews.author: JGJ

customer_reviews.title: Clear tubs are great for organizing basement
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price. Needing to get my basement organized and clear tubs are the way to go for me.
customer_reviews.author: KELSEY'SCORNER

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: One came broken but other 4 were fine so I didn’t bother returning it so I could get on with my organizing. The price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Canan Al-Mawaz

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: lids fit, size is correct, no breaks, am using for a lettuce and spinach indoor garden.
customer_reviews.author: Charlsey Oft

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The tubs are sturdy enough, but the lids are flimsy, crack under any real weight, and come off all too easily.
customer_reviews.author: 1060 is not 1200

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cost effective
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these storage bins in the past and very satisfied. They are durable and cost effective. Storing items in a basement is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Impression
customer_reviews.text: Shipped faster than what was expected, but only came with four containers. The lids aren't the most secure. I don't think I'd order these again unfortunately. We'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a work back-to-school drive event. Worked well ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a work back-to-school drive event. Worked well for what we needed them for. Not sure if I'd buy them for home use, the lids are not secure.
customer_reviews.author: Teddi.Ursine

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal but some broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our business storage needs however this is the second time we have ordered them and there is always one or two that arrive broken. Perhaps a better packaging option is available to make sure all contents arrive intact?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Novesteras

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: After much research, this is the best deal in town for tubs. As a teacher, they work perfect for me to store files and books.
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: LIDS DO NOT LATCH, THEY WILL FALL OFF
customer_reviews.text: I liked them. They worked for me for organizing toys by type but Know This: the lids DO NOT STAY ON! It is ok for my purposes and I liked the price but the lids are completely flopsy & flimsy!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Thete are sturdier options but not at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. These are cheaply ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. These are cheaply made bins but that hasnt stopped me from buying them multiple times. My wife and i have about 60 of these things. Sure, one breaks or cracks every once in a while, but its still less cost than other options.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Falk

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for under the bed shoe storage! Very good quality and you get 6!!!!! Great pricing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with who you buy from
customer_reviews.text: The plastic used to make the storage bins is pretty weak. I received mine broken and useless because the seller did not bother to ship the bins properly. I haven’t received any response from the seller regarding the defect. Although the bins are large, they are pretty useless since they can’t support much weight, and consequentially can’t be stacked to save floor space.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Unstackable Stackables
customer_reviews.text: I have always been pleased with Sterlite products; however, for the price I paid, these are below standards which diminishes their durability. The lids are very flimsy so I would not recommend stacking these on top of each other. I will not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: CountryGRITS

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got these to store my last husbands cloths in. Just not reasy to get rid of them. It has only been 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M.

customer_reviews.title: They fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these as they fit perfectly under my bed! I had tried others before but they were all too tall. These fit great though! I would have given it five stars if one didn't arrive chipped! I really didn't feel like dealing with the hassle of sending it back though and the broken part does not change my ability to use it. It was broken on one of the corners but the lid still fits and it is perfectly funtional still so I am willing to overlook it.
customer_reviews.author: Bates724

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, we use it to hold adhesive applied with a roller. Can leave the roller inside the tub with a make shift ramp to apply to laminate, and nothing dries out overnight or over the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: These are exactly what I was looking for. I ...
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I was looking for. I have a small bedroom with limited storage space. Beside being able to put 4 of these under the bed, they are narrow enough to fit on my closet shelf. I intend to order more very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One lid doesnt fit
customer_reviews.text: One of the lids does not fit. And the price is kind a littlr highfor only 6 bins.
customer_reviews.author: Anna8

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Under-Bed Storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for storage to go underneath both of my children’s beds! They were the perfect size to hold plenty of items and help organize their ever-growing toy collections! Definitely a MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: Jauqulyn

customer_reviews.title: I recommend these for extra storage
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it. Sturdy even when stacked on top of one another.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: Damaged during shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a sterilite box. The box had some damage on one corner and I ne of the bins had a cracked upper corner. Otherwise they are good light weight bins.
customer_reviews.author: Pale Rider 2/504

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with these storage bins. I priced them in the store, and they were much higher than buying 6 on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Pearly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage bins. They are a great size, including the depth. I store all my shoes in them, underneath my bed. So, I'm not tripping over the shoes and it keeps the less used shoes from getting dusty during the off-season. The bins are easy to use, the covers fit nice and snug. I can fit at least four of these underneath a full size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Yashi Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Come on Amazon you can do better than this.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but came in with (1) of (6) damaged. Trying to return but the return label does not include postage which is almost $60. That's more than I paid for the (6) storage bins.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cullins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for stacking
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are stackable. Wish the covers would click closed but they do not. Otherwise great storage boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Fraidy Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for riding style boots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for riding style boots. Less expensive that The Container Store
customer_reviews.author: LeslieVic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: These totes have really gotten me organized. The size was just right for my storage bins. Will be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Linda gatlin

customer_reviews.title: I did not think the lids locked but they do
customer_reviews.text: I like the tote boxes but as heavy as they are i thought the closure on the lids should be a little sturdier. The size is great holds alot
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A.

product_meta.title: Sterilite 19608006 41 Quart/39 Liter Underbed Storage Box, Clear with White Lid, 6-Pack
product_meta.description:
Size:41 Quart| Style:6-PackThe 45 Gallon Wheeled Latch Tote offers durable construction that is ideal for storing household items in the garage, basement or attic. The lid fits tightly to the base and remains secure with the use of sturdy latches. Multiple totes are able to stack securely on top of each other; and contoured end panels create a surface for comfortable lifting. This tote is also equipped with wheels to allow for easier transporting of heavy loads.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Sterilite 19608006 41-Quart Underbed Box White Lid with See-Through Base 6-Pack. Clear storage items feature a see-through base allowing contents to be easily identified by the user. Fashionably contoured end panels create recessed handles for easy lifting and transporting. Secure fit lids feature comfortable grips and an indexed surface area for exceptional stability when stacking multiple units. This box offers a slim design that fits under a bed to maximize potential storage space.
feature_bullets: See-through base for easy identification of contents
Slim design fits underbed to maximize storage space
